Name: Exhuming Faith
Toast: Walk the Zakarum pilgrim path for great rewards.
Phase10Description: I've found a dead monk's journal along with a note giving cryptic clues to a scroll of great power hidden on the coast of Kotun's Reach. I should search for the first location in the note.
Callback9Header: Find the Zakarum Trail Marker in Khotun's Reach
Phase13Description: I've found the great wreck listed in the note. Now I need to find the marker on an overlook.
Callback12Header: Find the Zakarum Trail Marker on the overlook
Phase27Description: Reading the scroll summoned a demon.  Perhaps this was the demon's way of tricking people into bringing it to Sanctuary.
Phase53Description: I've found the lone tree. The monk's scroll must be nearby.
Phase19Description: At the end of the trail sits a strange scroll. It must be the one the monk spoke of.
